title: Nx MFE Host App
description: Create an Angular Host Micro Frontend Application

examples.description: Create an Angular app with configuration in place for MFE. If remotes is provided, attach the remote app to this app's configuration.

name.description: The name to give to the host Angular app.

host.description: The name of the host app to attach this host app to.

port.description: The port on which this app should be served.

dynamic.description: Should the host app use dynamic federation?
